titleStmt.title: The names of the knights, citizens, and burgesses of the House of Commons assembled in Parliament, begun at Westminster, 3 Novem. 1640 as they continued and were elected and sworne members of the same house, untill this present 11 of July. 1648.
Lists. 1640-11-03.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley
